attributes.action: Stop Foreign nationals entering Britain and claiming or being given any form of benefits or housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any foreign nationals entering the united kingdom should not have any right to claim or be given any form of benefits or housing.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=immigration
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
